name: Virat Kohli
description: One of the best batsmen in modern cricket, known for his aggressive batting style and exceptional run-scoring ability.

name: Babar Azam
description: Captain of the Pakistan cricket team, recognized for his elegant batting and consistency across formats.

name: Kane Williamson
description: New Zealand's captain, known for his calm demeanor and outstanding technique as a batsman.

name: Rohit Sharma
description: An explosive opener for India, famous for his ability to score big centuries in limited-overs cricket.

name: Joe Root
description: England's Test captain, known for his solid technique and ability to anchor the innings.

name: AB de Villiers
description: Former South African cricketer, celebrated for his innovative batting and exceptional fielding skills.

name: Steve Smith
description: Australian batsman known for his unorthodox style and remarkable consistency in Test cricket.

name: Ben Stokes
description: Dynamic all-rounder for England, famous for his match-winning performances in crucial games.

name: Jasprit Bumrah
description: India's premier fast bowler, known for his unique bowling action and ability to bowl yorkers at will.

name: Rashid Khan
description: Afghan spin wizard, renowned for his leg-spin bowling and effectiveness in T20 leagues worldwide.
